name: Rick
text: Hiiiiiii, my name is Rick! My mommy calls me Rickey...Whats your name?

name: You
text: My is Tom, most people call me Tommy

name: Rick
text: I dont really know where my Dad is...have you seen him?

name: You
text: I havent seen him but if I do i'll let him know where you are

name: Rick
text: When you see him tell him I was looking for my rook!
